goal:
EFFA is a non-profit making European Association whose purpose is to protect and enhance flavour industry interests for the common benefit of consumers, as well as our customers, members and partners in Europe.

Its main objectives are:
- to promote and support a consistent European wide Flavour strategy for Flavour Issues;
- to elaborate scientific dossiers, for evaluation by the EU Institutions – Scientific Committees, stimulating, coordinating and monitoring best practice in regulatory, safety, technical and scientific issues, between members of the Flavour sector and related industries through Standards, Guidelines and Codes of Practice;
- to coordinate approved European work streams or projects that require support and cooperation from Global, Regional and National organisations;
- to provide coordination and communication between members during any incident or crisis management scenarios that require or would benefit from an “EFFA” response.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
